description: A woman seeking to become a strategist of Sousou`s forces, and is also romantically attracted to the warlord. She ends up becoming Sousou`s bodyguard instead, much to her chargin. Later her talent as strategist is accepted by Sousou who realizes she`s much suitable to be her strategist. Teiiku calls her Icchan (いっちゃん).
name: Kakuka Houkou
